TemplateContent.Subject: Thank you for joining the OH2025 Preview!
TemplateContent.Text: Dear {{name}}, Thank you for participating the OH2025 Preview! As a token of participation, you can download your very own Cartoonized Image from this URL.

Dear {{name}},

Thank you for participating the OH2025 Preview! As a token of participation, you can download your very own Cartoonized Image from this URL.
